name: WGT-GuideNewsFlash(en)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Receive the latest updates from the Wave-Gotik-Treffen festival by WGT-Guide. The feed contains band announcements, schedule updates, new WGT-Guide functions, etc.

Find more information in the WGT-Guide app!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
